manda yath, ee sa dushkara mardhanayan, ee sa katuka athdakim, laba gath wirodhara jayagrahanayan, siya janathawata itu kala maha meheyan, siyaluma kshethra pilibanda thibu paripurna danum sambharayath, parajaya kala nohaki abhithabhawayath, me mihithalaya ekama yayak lesa salaku, epariddenma muda hala manawa dayawath ek minisekuta, ek jiwitha kalayak thula laba gannata hakiyawak pawathinne nam eya prathiharyayak wana bawini.

me nisa athiwana siduwim pela bad kantri chithrapatayata thema wi atha.kris brinkar adhyakshanaya kala bad kantri chithrapataye mat dilon, ami smart, toch barganar, nil makdoses athulu nalu niliyan rasak bad kantri chithrapatayata ranganayen dayaka wi atha.sagara thilinasinhala sinama prekshakayanata me dinawala laba gatha haki di. wi. di. patayaki sagara thilina chithrapataya.prawina kamara shilpi em. ee. gafur nishpadanaya kara adhyakshanaya kala sagara thilina chithrapataye wijaya kumarathungayan gayu rallen rallata githaya da athulathya.shashi wijendra, morin charuni, fredi silwa, royi da silwa, tenisan kure, mak samsan, lakmal fonseka, thalatha gunasekara, mahesh jayasinha athulu janapriya nalu niliyan rasak rangana sagara thilina hasyamaya aadara puwathak ragath janapriya sinhala chithrapatayaki.liwwe – kalyana chandrasekara
